Package webd4201.hinbestd

Class StudentDA

java.lang.Object
webd4201.hinbestd.StudentDA
public class StudentDA
extends java.lang.Object
StudentDA - this file is contains all of the data access methods, that actually get/set data to the database. Note: that all the methods are static this is because you do not really create StudentDA objects (does not make sense)
Since:
2.0

    StudentDA()

      public StudentDA()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize​(java.sql.Connection c)
      Creates a new database connection
      Parameters:
      c - the connection variable for the database

    • terminate

      public static void terminate()
      Closes the database connection

    • retrieve

      public static Student retrieve​(long key) throws NotFoundException
      Retrieves the database records based on the ID number provided
      Parameters:
      key - the ID number of the student
      Returns:
      a student with the ID passed
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - thrown if there is no user with the ID provided

    • create

      public static boolean create​(Student aStudent) throws DuplicateException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Creates a new student record into the database
      Parameters:
      aStudent - the student object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      a boolean value to verify if the user was added successfully
      Throws:
      DuplicateException - thrown if a user with the same ID exists already
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a hashing algorithm doesn't exist

    • delete

      public static int delete​(Student aStudent) throws NotFoundException
      Removes a user from the database
      Parameters:
      aStudent - the student that is being removed
      Returns:
      the number of existing records in the database
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - thrown if the user to be deleted was not found

    • update

      public static int update​(Student aStudent) throws NotFoundException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Updates an existing student record with the student object passed
      Parameters:
      aStudent - the updated student content
      Returns:
      the number of records in the database
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - thrown if no user with the provided content exists
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the hashing algorithm doesn't exist

    • authenticate

      public static Student authenticate​(long id, java.lang.String password) throws NotFoundException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Authenticates the user from the database if the id/password combination exists
      Parameters:
      id - The student ID
      password - the student's password
      Returns:
      The student details
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - thrown when a student does not exist
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when an algorithm doesn't exist

    • isExistingLogin

      public static boolean isExistingLogin​(long id, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if the user is currently logged in
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID
      password - The user password
      Returns:
      return true of the login exists
